editor.fontFamily: 'JetBrainsMono Nerd Font', 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace

editor.tokenColorCustomizations: Developer: Generate Color Theme From Current Settings

gitlens.experimental.generateCommitMessa: Commit messages must have a short description that is less than 50 chars followed by a newline and a more detailed description.- Write concisely using an informal tone
